*Evaluation and Mitigation of Environmental Impacts from Continual Treated Groundwater Discharge at Santa Susana Outfall 2 Drainage.*

### Mission Statement
To remove hurdles preventing the efficient treatment of contaminated groundwater at the Santa Susana Field Laboratory (SSFL) and develop tools that can be used broadly to solve similar water discharge problems.
